title: "This Robot Swarm Gets Smarter The More It Works"
excerpt: "Advertisement Are you ready for autonomous robots that learn the more they work? I sure am not. This might be the beginning of the end. The start of SkyNet. A robotics company called Geek+ just said that it has developed a swarm of autonomous worker robots that can learn and improve the more they work."
